name: Fastmetrics
tag_list: metricfiber, metro-area-ethernet, t1, adsl, voip, t3, broadband, cable-internet, fiber-optic, email, hosting, pbx, converged-solutions, business-solutions, it-solutions, high-speed-internet, colocation, data-center
overview:
Fastmetrics is a Business Networks Solutions provider specializing in high speed broadband services using fiber, t1, & adsl services with voip hosted pbx systems integration.

Fastmetrics was founded by Andreas Glocker in 2002, as the leading network solutions provider offloading critical IT tasks such as managing networks, hosted email and communications solutions for the Business community.

Fastmetrics is a business to business service provider. We are a partner for your in-house IT department. We offload critical functions such as phone service, email hosting, server maintenance, virus and spam filtering.

Fastmetrics can help your IT department with your business e-commerce site server hosting and administration and high speed internet connectivity. We can provision DSL, T1, T2 and higher speed services on our managed network.

Based upon your business needs, Fastmetrics can offer a variety of solutions. This process starts by analyzing current setup in your office. (Your current network configuration coupled with the number of employees in your office will affect how much bandwidth your company needs to work efficiently).

If you have employees that access resources on your local network from a remote location (Remote Access), then you will benefit from having a T1 or higher connection in your work place.
